code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{fetchTypes}from"./api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TypeFilter=_ref=>{let{setSelectedType}=_ref;const[types,setTypes]=useState([]);const[selected,setSelected]=useState("All Types");useEffect(()=>{const getTypes=async()=>{try{const response=await fetchTypes();setTypes(response);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching types:",error);}};getTypes();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"type-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"type-menu-title",children:"Type"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"type-menu-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`type-item ${selected==="All Types"?"selected":""}`,onClick:()=>{setSelected("All Types");setSelectedType(null);},children:"All Types"})}),types.length>0?types.map(type=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`type-item ${selected===type?"selected":""}`,onClick:()=>{setSelected(type);setSelectedType(type);},children:type})},type)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"No types available"})]})]});};export default TypeFilter;
